r.s: OO-Interface to modify and handle HTTP-Headers easily, including some classes that handle common subjects (like Caching, etc.).
r.d: This class provides methods to set/modify HTTP-Headers. To abstract common things, like caching etc. some sub classes are provided that handle special cases (i.e. HTTP_Header_Cache). Also provides methods for checking Status types (i.e. HTTP_Header::isError())
r.n: * Fixed Errors in sendStatusCode * Fixed all HTTP_Header::isError (and similar) methods * Fixed HTTP_Header::sendStatusCode
